title: Snowdown Yorick
body: {{champion:83}}  has few skins could we get a snowdown yorick skin like the one in the picture. His ghouls could be different colored elves that attack the target. lets show the gravedigger some love.  Could also change his sound from I'll bury you alive to I was buried alive or something along that nature.

replies.body:
Okay, first of all, your name is awesome. ^-^

I've never seen this idea before, and holy crap, it's amazing! I love the bells on his back, haha. It'd be awesome if they jingled when he walks! 

Yorick needs a bit of an update before we give him some skins, but this is something we could consider for next year's Snowdown! \*saves image for later*

Would you happen to know who the artist is for this?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EN6PQnH9,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-12-01T23:25:51.063+0000)

> Would you happen to know who the artist is for this?

Took some browsing but
Got you covered there it's done by nadriell below is his deviantart
http://nadriell.deviantart.com/
Thank you so much! ^-^ I reverse image searched, but I couldn't find anything.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EN6PQnH9,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-12-01T23:25:51.063+0000)

> Yorick needs a bit of an update before we give him some skins, but this is something we could consider for next year's Snowdown!

You're not actually implying that he will have his champion update before next snowdown, right?
Nope, no implications. Just saying it'd be the next earliest opportunity for this particular skin.

I thought the entire point of changing the holiday scheme was so you could release skins like this whenever you want.  Isn't that exactly what the change was from this last Harrowing on for future holiday themed events?
While it gives us more leeway, it doesn't necessarily imply Christmas in July.

Now now, Katey. You and I both know Snowdown isn't about Christmas, just like the Harrowing isn't about Halloween. It's about snow and winter! And on that note, Australia would like a word with you about July snow. 

/sassy

I'm just kidding. You guys are doing a great job. <3

So troll. :P 

We actually have someone on our team from Australia and it's not uncommon for a similar discussion to come up!

Oh? What gets said?

"Kateypls no pool party right now."

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EN6PQnH9,comment-id=000400010000,timestamp=2015-12-02T00:04:52.572+0000)
>
> Nope, no implications. Just saying it'd be the next earliest opportunity for this particular skin.

Had a feeling you weren't trying to imply anything, but I wasn't completely sure.
Does that mean Yorick rework by the end of next year? :O
Nothing promised. :P Next year's snowdown would be the earliest opportunity for another snowy-themed skin.
also Karthus
If everything goes as planned, then yes, that's very likely, considering they've been working on him since March 2015 (or even earlier if we take Xelnath's work into account).
didn't know they were still working on him
Can his ghouls be snowmen? Something festive.

whos gonna be the next pax skin? and how much does it cost to participate in the pax thingy

and how many times a year and at what time does the PAX happen day month hour

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EN6PQnH9,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-12-01T23:25:51.063+0000)
>
> Okay, first of all, your name is awesome. ^-^
> 
> I've never seen this idea before, and holy crap, it's amazing! I love the bells on his back, haha. It'd be awesome if they jingled when he walks! 
> 
> Yorick needs a bit of an update before we give him some skins, but this is something we could consider for next year's Snowdown! \*saves image for later*
> 
> Would you happen to know who the artist is for this?

You mean Snowdown 2017, don't you?
Or even change the joke / taunt to say I'll shovel your drive.
ROFL, this is amazing.
His ghosts could be snowmen.

> [{quoted}](name=Kenji Chang,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EN6PQnH9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-01T01:06:13.744+0000)
>
> His ghosts could be snowmen.

Great idea

Is there any idea when we might could be expecting the Yorick update? He's been on the "not eligible for free rotation" like for how long? I'd love to see him actually have a chance like all the other champions to get skins and be played.
He needs a new skin I love yorick so much
Omg so amazing. I'm all for it. Id buy it
